title: RAAF Record. Newsreel No. 02
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Royal Australian Air Force. Directorate of Public Relations, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Airplanes, Military
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Korean War, 1950-1953
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Air warfare
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Airplanes - Design and construction
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia. Parliament. Senate
description: The following newsreel items are covered: The end in Korea - No. 77 Squadron fought till the last day; Thanks sister! - RAAF evacuates Korean wounded; Canberras for RAAF - Australia makes jet bomber; The air race - London to New Zealand - 24 hours; Williamtown is busy - school of land/air warfare; Off to the coronation - RAAF and WRAAF looked fine; Faster than sound - RAAF gets sonic jet fighter. Narrated by Douglas H. Moon.
